name: EKParticipantStatus
desc: The participant’s attendance status for an event.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The participant’s attendance status is unknown.

items.name: case pending
items.desc: The participant has yet to respond to the event.

items.name: case accepted
items.desc: The participant has accepted the event.

items.name: case declined
items.desc: The participant has declined the event.

items.name: case tentative
items.desc: The participant’s attendance status is tentative.

items.name: case delegated
items.desc: The participant has delegated attendance to another participant.

items.name: case inProcess
items.desc: The participant’s event is currently in process.
